Title: Relates to limited permits to practice medicine
Summary: Provides that limited permits to practice medicine may be renewed biennially; expands the types of facilities where permitees may practice; authorizes permits to be renewed at the discretion of the department of education; provides that such department shall not deny a limited permit based solely on the previous number of authorizations of such permits issued to the applicant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to limited permits to practice medicine
